snippet: The BBC appoints an insider to the post of director general, Kim Dotcom invites fans over for a swim, and "Magic Mike" draws a big gay audience.
abstract: The BBC appoints an insider to the post of director general, Kim Dotcom invites fans over for a swim, and "Magic Mike" draws a big gay audience.

headline.main: The Breakfast Meeting: New Head of BBC, and New Candor From R&B Singer
